section.P: Use to generate a prototypical Melati project.
section.p: This will create an empty database and allow you to edit it at http://localhost:8080/. You shoudl login using the username _administrator_ and password FIXME then add table definitionas and column definitions.
When you have finished, for now, stop Jetty with Ctrl-C.
New java files will be generated when you next run mvn test.
